assignments.description: Assigning Record Type Id to Variable so it can be used in the Quick Choice "Filter by Record Type Id" field.
assignments.name: Assign_Record_Type_Id
assignments.label: Assign Record Type Id

Flow.description: BC - Updated record type id assignment description

formulas.description: returns true if "will you be doing the work yourself?" is yes and electrical is included in the corresponding multi-select
formulas.name: ResidentialElectricalSelf
testingTotalSquareSUM
formulas.expression: if(ISBLANK({!XShed_Storage_Building}), 0, {!XShed_Storage_Building}) + if(ISBLANK({!XGazebo_Pergola}), 0, {!XGazebo_Pergola}) + if(ISBLANK({!XPool_Dimensions}), 0, {!XPool_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Deck_Dimensions}), 0, {!Deck_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}), 0, {!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Carport_Dimensions}), 0, {!Carport_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Porch_Dimensions}), 0, {!Porch_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!X1st_Floor}), 0, {!X1st_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X2nd_Floor}), 0, {!X2nd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor})

formulas.name: TextHeatedSquareFootage
formulas.expression: IF({!Is_the_additonal_square_footage_heated} = "Yes", {!TextSquareFootage}, IF({!Is_the_additonal_square_footage_heated} = "Partially", TEXT(If(ISBLANK({!Garage_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Garage_Heated_Sq_Ft}) + If(ISBLANK({!Bathrooms_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Bathrooms_Heated_Sq_Ft}) + IF(ISBLANK({!Bedrooms_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Bedrooms_Heated_Sq_Ft}) + IF(ISBLANK({!Deck_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Deck_Heated_Sq_Ft}) + IF(ISBLANK({!Porch_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Porch_Heated_Sq_Ft}) + IF(ISBLANK({!Other_Heated_Area_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Other_Heated_Area_Sq_Ft}) + IF(ISBLANK({!Walk_Up_Attic_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Walk_Up_Attic_Heated_Sq_Ft}) + IF(ISBLANK({!Shed_Storage_Heated_Sq_Ft}), 0, {!Shed_Storage_Heated_Sq_Ft})), " "))

formulas.name: TextSquareFootage
formulas.expression: TEXT(if(ISBLANK({!XShed_Storage_Building}), 0, {!XShed_Storage_Building}) + if(ISBLANK({!XGazebo_Pergola}), 0, {!XGazebo_Pergola}) + if(ISBLANK({!X1st_Floor}), 0, {!X1st_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X2nd_Floor}), 0, {!X2nd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!XPool_Dimensions}), 0, {!XPool_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Deck_Dimensions}), 0, {!Deck_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}), 0, {!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Carport_Dimensions}), 0, {!Carport_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Other_Detached_Structure_Dimensions}), 0, {!Other_Detached_Structure_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Porch_Dimensions}), 0, {!Porch_Dimensions}))

formulas.name: TotalSquareFootage
formulas.expression: if(ISBLANK({!XShed_Storage_Building}), 0, {!XShed_Storage_Building}) + if(ISBLANK({!XGazebo_Pergola}), 0, {!XGazebo_Pergola}) + if(ISBLANK({!XPool_Dimensions}), 0, {!XPool_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Deck_Dimensions}), 0, {!Deck_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}), 0, {!Garage_Attached_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Carport_Dimensions}), 0, {!Carport_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!Porch_Dimensions}), 0, {!Porch_Dimensions}) + if(ISBLANK({!X1st_Floor}), 0, {!X1st_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X2nd_Floor}), 0, {!X2nd_Floor}) + if(ISBLANK({!X3rd_Floor}), 0, {!X3rd_Floor})

formulas.name: Work_Type_Validation
formulas.expression: IF(AND( {!Work_Type_Residential.value} = "Renovation/Remodel", {!Are_you_increasing_the_footprint_of_the_structure} = "Yes"), False, IF(AND( CONTAINS({!Why_type_of_Accessory}, "Shed/Storage Building"), {!Is_the_footprint_of_the_Shed_Storage_Building_12_or_less_in_all_directions} = "Yes"), False, True))

formulas.name: Work_Type_Validation_Text
formulas.expression: IF(AND( {!Work_Type_Residential.value} = "Renovation/Remodel", {!Are_you_increasing_the_footprint_of_the_structure} = "Yes"), "Increasing the footprint is not allowed under a Renovation/Remodel Permit. Please apply for an Addition Permit.", IF(AND( CONTAINS({!Why_type_of_Accessory}, "Shed/Storage Building"), {!Is_the_footprint_of_the_Shed_Storage_Building_12_or_less_in_all_directions} = "Yes"), "No Building Permit is required for the Shed/Storage Structure. Please apply for a Zoning Compliance Instead. If applying for multiple Accessory Types, uncheck Shed/Storage Building option to continue.", " "))

Flow.label: (Permit) Residential Permit

loops.name: Loop_through_Area_Sq_Ft_items
loops.label: Loop through Area Sq Ft items

fields.name: Residential_Permit_Project_Details_Display
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Provide us with additional details about the project by filling in the details below.

fields.name: DisplayText_WorkTypesRelocatedStructure
fields.fieldText:
Relocated Structures require an Engineer Footing and Foundation Plan to be submitted.

If further work is being completed in addition to relocating the structure, an additional permit will need to be submitted.

fields.name: Applicant_and_Work_Info
fields.fieldText: Owner and Occupancy Details

fields.name: Do_you_currently_occupy_the_property
fields.fieldText: Does the owner currently occupy the property?

fields.name: Will_you_occupy_the_dwelling_upon_completion
fields.fieldText: Will the owner occupy the dwelling upon completion and one year post completion?

fields.name: Are_you_increasing_the_footprint_of_the_structure
fields.fieldText: Are you increasing the footprint of the structure?

fields.name: DisplayText_WorkTypesRenovation
fields.fieldText: Increasing the footprint is not allowed under a Renovation/Remodel Permit. Please apply for an Addition Permit.

fields.name: General_Contractor_Is_Required_helper_text
fields.fieldText: State Law N.C.G.S. 87-1 requires a Licensed General Contractor to manage or oversee construction projects where the cost of the project is $40,000 or greater.

fields.name: Are_you_are_licensed_general_contractor
fields.fieldText: Are you are licensed general contractor?

fields.name: Will_you_be_doing_the_work_yourself
fields.fieldText: Will you be doing the work yourself?

fields.name: property_occupancy_helper_text
fields.fieldText: State Law N.C.G.S 87-1 provides exemption for building construction projects where the PROPERTY OWNER intends to solely occupy the building being altered or built on his/her own property. If the building is not occupied solely by the property owner for at least 12 months following completion of the project, it is presumed that the property owner did not intend to solely occupy the building. If the property owner meets these criteria, he can, in essence, act as his own general contractor and perform the duty of superintending the construction project himself and thus, is exempt from the requirement of hiring a licensed general contractor. However, the law does not allow the property owner to obtain a building permit under this exemption and then delegate his duty to superintend the construction project to an unlicensed person.

fields.name: Select_work_you_will_be_doing_yourself
fields.fieldText: Select work you will be doing yourself

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 7) OR (1 AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND 5 AND 6)

fields.name: Will_there_be_an_additional_retaining_wall_for_the_Accessory
fields.fieldText: Will there be an additional retaining wall for the Accessory?

fields.name: Is_the_footprint_of_the_Shed_Storage_Building_12_or_less_in_all_directions
fields.fieldText: Is the footprint of the Shed/Storage Building 12' or less in all directions?

fields.name: HALT_Accessory
fields.fieldText:
STOP! No Building Permit is required for the Shed/Storage Structure. Please apply for a Zoning Compliance Instead.

If applying for multiple Accessory Types, uncheck Shed/Storage Building option to continue.

fields.name: Is_foundation_24_or_less_above_finished_grade
fields.fieldText: Is foundation 24" or less above finished grade?

fields.name: Is_this_property_located_in_a_Subdivision_under_construction
fields.fieldText: Is this property located in a Subdivision under construction?

fields.name: investigation_required_text
fields.fieldText: An investigation is required to determine the availability of utilities to this property

fields.name: driveway_requirement_helper_text
fields.fieldText: Please fill out the following information for your new single family dwelling in regards to driveway construction information (Driveway Permit fee to be assessed at intake)

visibilityRule.conditionLogic: (3 AND 4 AND 6) OR (1 AND 2 AND 6) OR 5 OR 6

fields.name: Is_there_an_existing_curb_and_gutter
fields.fieldText: Is there an existing curb and gutter?

fields.name: Total_pipe_length_to_be_installed
fields.fieldText: Total pipe length to be installed

fields.name: Does_the_lot_have_had_existing_water_and_sewer_service
fields.fieldText: Does the lot have/had existing water and sewer service?

fields.name: Will_this_addition_require_electrical_service_modification
fields.fieldText: Will this addition require electrical service modification?
fields.helpText: Select 'Yes' if power will be dropped, reconnected, and/or relocated.

fields.name: Are_you_adding_a_new_power_meter
fields.fieldText: Are you adding a new power meter?

fields.name: Will_any_underground_electrical_work_be_performed
fields.fieldText: Will any underground electrical work be performed?

fields.name: Do_you_need_temporary_power
fields.helpText: (T-POLE) Power pole for construction of project. Removed from project site when Conditional Power or Permanent Power is approved and released.

fields.name: Conditional_Power
fields.helpText: (Application required) Granted when project has made safe as required for the energizing of a portion or all the electrical system before CO.

fields.name: Conditional_Gas
fields.helpText: (Gas Meter approved to be set) Gas system has been tested and approved for placement of gas meter prior to CO.

fields.name: Please_select_room_type_s_being_added
fields.fieldText: Please select room type(s) being added

fields.name: New_Structure_Heightt
fields.helpText: Enter height in ft.

fields.name: Square_Footage_Info_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: Square Footage Information

fields.name: Relevant_Square_Footage
fields.fieldText: Please enter square footage by area here:

fields.name: Enter_all_that_apply
fields.fieldText:
*Enter all square footage/measurements that apply.

If structure includes multiple levels/floors, include total square footage across all floors.

fields.name: Total_Heated_Square_Footage
fields.helpText: If structure includes multiple levels/floors, include total square footage across all floors.

fields.name: Is_the_additonal_square_footage_heated
fields.fieldText: Is the additonal square footage heated?

fields.name: Record_type_header
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Square_footage_review_helper_text
fields.fieldText:
Please ensure that the area contents and individual square footage match up to the total square footage that is expected on the project.

If there are any areas of the building not accounted for please use the Previous button to return to the last page and input applicable area fields.


(e.g., Number of Stories = 4 but only First and Second Floor square footages were input)

fields.name: Residential_Header
fields.fieldText: New {!Record_Type_Name} Application

fields.name: Residential_Project_Details
fields.fieldText:
Project Details

Select the Work Type below.
